wikitext.*:
'''ai''' is [[Quenya]] for ''alas''.<ref>{{RGEO|Namarie}}, line 1</ref>

==Example==
*'''''Ai!''' [[laure|Laurië]] [[lanta]]r [[lassë|lassi]]...'' = "'''Ah!''' like gold fall the leaves"
* '''''Ai''' lintulindova Lasselanta'' = "'''Oh!''' Fall with its many swallows"<ref>{{VT|40a}}</ref>

==Cognates==
*''[[a]]''
